Notes: A crab enemy that damages the player upon contact. It can be defeated by attacking the weak spot on its back. However, it can be defeated with fireballs, the Spin Drill, Koopa Shells and the Rainbow power-up as well. It can dig through sand collision to warp to another spot on sand collision. KaninaRed drops some Star Bits when defeated whereas Kanina spawns a 1-Up. It can be frozen by the Orange Luma.

SearchTurtle.Description: Red Koopa Shells and Gold Shells home in on this object.

MoveLimitCollision.Description: The object's collision binder also checks for MoveLimit collision.

YoshiLockOnTarget.Description: This object can be targeted, eaten and shot by Yoshi.

Obj_arg0.Name: Can Dig?
Obj_arg0.Description: If set, it can dig through sand collision.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated. This switch is required in SMG1.
